validationRules.block_id: Required. Unique identifier for this accordion item.
validationRules.title: Required. Accordion panel title text. Displayed in header. Supports plain text (HTML stripped).
validationRules.index: Number. Position of this item in accordion (0-based). Used for defaultAct matching. Auto-set by editor.
validationRules.innerIcon: Boolean. When true, shows icon before title. Requires iniconFonts and innericonName.
validationRules.iniconFonts: Icon library. Values: 'font_awesome'. Default: 'font_awesome'. Only when innerIcon: true.
validationRules.innericonName: FontAwesome class for item icon (e.g., 'fas fa-home'). Required when innerIcon: true.
validationRules.iconAlign: Inherited from parent. Values: 'start', 'end'. Position of toggle icons (not inner icon).
validationRules.titleAlign: Text alignment. Values: 'text-left', 'text-center', 'text-right'. Default: 'text-left'. Inherited from parent.
validationRules.titleTag: Inherited from parent. HTML heading level (h1-h6). Applied to all items in accordion.
validationRules.toggleIcon: Inherited from parent. Boolean for +/- toggle indicators. Cannot override per item.
validationRules.iconName: Inherited from parent. Toggle icon for closed state. Cannot override per item.
validationRules.ActiconName: Inherited from parent. Toggle icon for open state. Cannot override per item.
validationRules.defaultAct: Inherited from parent. Number matching this item's index to open by default.
validationRules.markupSch: Inherited from parent. Boolean for How-To schema. When true, this item becomes a schema step.
validationRules.hrefLink: Optional URL string. Makes title clickable link. Opens in same/new tab based on implementation.
validationRules.innerBlocks: Array of child blocks for content. Can contain any blocks (paragraph, heading, image, button, etc.).
validationRules.uniqueKey: Auto-generated unique identifier. Do not modify manually.
validationRules.className: Optional CSS class string for custom styling.

warnings: CRITICAL: tp-accordion-inner MUST have parent: ['tpgb/tp-accordion']. Cannot be used standalone.
CRITICAL: inserter: false means this block cannot be added directly - only created inside tp-accordion.
CRITICAL: Never modify block_id or uniqueKey - causes accordion to break.
index value must match actual position in accordion. Mismatches cause defaultAct to open wrong item.
innerIcon: true requires innericonName to be set, otherwise leaves blank space.
hrefLink makes entire title clickable. Test UX - users may expect title to toggle accordion, not navigate away.
Most styling (colors, typography, borders, backgrounds) inherited from parent tp-accordion block.
Cannot override parent's toggleIcon, iconName, ActiconName, atOneOpen, onHvrtab per item.
titleTag inherited from parent - all items in accordion use same heading level.
Empty innerBlocks array creates accordion with title only (no content when expanded).
commonMistakes: Trying to use tp-accordion-inner without tp-accordion parent (block won't appear in inserter)
Setting innerIcon: true without innericonName (icon doesn't appear)
Confusing innerIcon (per-item icon before title) with toggleIcon (parent's +/- icons)
Setting index manually instead of letting editor auto-assign (causes defaultAct issues)
Forgetting that most styling comes from parent (trying to style individual items)
Using hrefLink without considering UX (title navigates away instead of toggling)
Setting defaultAct on child (it's a parent setting, not per-item)
Not providing innerBlocks content (creates empty accordion panel)
Mixing up innericonName (child) with iconName (parent toggle icons)
bestPractices: Title length: 3-10 words for comfortable reading and mobile display
Use innerIcon to categorize accordion items visually (e.g., all pricing items use $ icon)
Keep innerBlocks content concise - very long content inside accordion hurts UX
Use hrefLink sparingly - most users expect titles to toggle, not navigate
For How-To schema: each item represents one step, title is step name
Index starts at 0 - let editor auto-assign, don't set manually unless necessary
Content structure: Start with paragraph or heading, end with CTA button if applicable
Avoid nesting accordions inside accordion items (creates confusing UX)
For video content: add descriptive paragraph before/after video for context
For image content: use medium/large WordPress sizes (full size too big for accordion)
Test with empty innerBlocks - some designs look better with title-only items
Use consistent innerIcon style across all items in same accordion

layoutContext.parentBlocks: MUST be child of tpgb/tp-accordion. Cannot exist outside accordion parent.
layoutContext.childBlocks: Can contain any blocks via innerBlocks: tp-pro-paragraph, tp-heading, tp-image, tp-video, tp-button, etc.
layoutContext.siblingBlocks: Other tp-accordion-inner blocks within same tp-accordion parent
layoutContext.parentChildRelationship: Parent tp-accordion controls: toggleIcon, iconName, ActiconName, titleTag, iconAlign, atOneOpen, onHvrtab, defaultAct, markupSch. Child inherits these and adds: title, innerIcon, hrefLink, innerBlocks.
layoutContext.indexBehavior: index property auto-assigned by editor based on position. Used by parent's defaultAct to determine which item opens by default.
layoutContext.innerIconVsToggleIcon: innerIcon appears BEFORE title text (per-item, optional). toggleIcon appears AFTER title (parent setting, all items). Both can exist simultaneously.
layoutContext.hrefLinkBehavior: When set, entire title becomes clickable <a> tag. Clicking navigates instead of toggling accordion. Use carefully.
layoutContext.contentInheritance: Typography, colors, backgrounds, borders, shadows all inherited from parent's descTypo, descColor, descPadding, descBorder, descbgType, etc.

performanceConsiderations: Large innerBlocks arrays (10+ blocks per item) can slow accordion rendering
Video blocks (tp-video) in accordion items load immediately even when collapsed - use sparingly
Images should use medium/large sizes, not full (accordion doesn't need huge images)
Very long text content (1000+ words) in single item hurts mobile performance
FontAwesome icons (innerIcon) load from font - ensure font loaded before accordion renders
Multiple accordions on same page with many items each can cause layout thrashing on scroll
accessibilityNotes: Title must be descriptive and clear for screen readers
innerIcon is decorative - ensure ARIA labels are present (plugin handles this)
Heading level (titleTag) inherited from parent - maintain proper heading hierarchy
Keyboard navigation: Title should be focusable with Tab, toggle with Enter/Space
When hrefLink is used, announce to screen readers that title is a link, not toggle
innerBlocks content should maintain semantic HTML (proper headings, lists, etc.)
Avoid using title text like 'Click here' - be specific about content (e.g., 'Pricing Information')
Long content inside accordion should still be scannable (use subheadings, lists, bold)

parentInheritedSettings.fromParent: These settings CANNOT be overridden per item - set on tp-accordion parent:
parentInheritedSettings.toggleIcon: Boolean - show/hide +/- toggle icons on all items
parentInheritedSettings.iconFont: String - icon library for toggle icons (font_awesome)
parentInheritedSettings.iconName: String - FontAwesome class for closed state toggle icon
parentInheritedSettings.ActiconName: String - FontAwesome class for open state toggle icon
parentInheritedSettings.titleTag: String - HTML heading level (h1-h6) for all titles
parentInheritedSettings.iconAlign: String - toggle icon position (start/end) for all items
parentInheritedSettings.titleAlign: String - text alignment (left/center/right) for all titles
parentInheritedSettings.atOneOpen: Boolean - only one panel open at time (affects all items)
parentInheritedSettings.onHvrtab: String - activation method (click/hover) for all items
parentInheritedSettings.defaultAct: String - which item index opens by default (matches index)
parentInheritedSettings.markupSch: Boolean - enable How-To schema for all items
parentInheritedSettings.allStyling: Typography, colors, backgrounds, borders, shadows, spacing - all from parent
parentInheritedSettings.perItemSettings: These CAN be set per accordion-inner item:
parentInheritedSettings.title: String - unique title for this panel
parentInheritedSettings.innerIcon: Boolean - show icon before this item's title
parentInheritedSettings.innericonName: String - FontAwesome class for this item's icon
parentInheritedSettings.hrefLink: String - make this item's title clickable link
parentInheritedSettings.innerBlocks: Array - unique content for this panel
